name: Excalibur Umbra
description: From the shadow of the long night emerges a new Excalibur.

abilities.name: Slash Dash
abilities.description: Slash and dash through enemies alongside a radial specter. The powerful Exalted Blade’s slashes inflict <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status.

abilities.name: Radial Howl
abilities.description: Let out ferocious howl that stuns nearby enemies and causes Sentients to shed any built up resistances.

abilities.name: Radial Javelin
abilities.description: Radial javelins impale nearby enemies, inflicting <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status.

abilities.name: Exalted Blade
abilities.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.

languages.description: Aus den Schatten der langen Nacht erscheint ein neuer Excalibur.
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Des ombres d'une nuit immémoriale émerge un nouvel Excalibur.
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Dall'ombra della lunga notte emerge un nuovo Excalibur.
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: 새로운 엑스칼리버에게 길고 긴 밤의 어둠이 스며들었습니다.
languages.name: 엑스칼리버 움브라

languages.description: Desde las sombras de la alargada noche emerge un nuevo Excalibur
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: 来自长夜暗影中的新型 Excalibur。
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Из тени затянувшейся ночи возникает новый Экскалибур.
languages.name: Экскалибур Умбра

languages.description: 長き夜の影から新たな Excalibur が現れる。
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Z cieni długiej nocy wynurza się nowy Excalibur.
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Da sombra da longa noite, emerge um novo Excalibur.
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: 來自漫漫長夜中的新型 Excalibur。
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Excalibur ตัวใหม่ปรากฏขึ้นหลังจากซ่อนอยู่ในเงามืดยามรัตติกาลมาอย่างยาวนาน
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: Uzun gecenin gölgesinden yeni bir Excalibur doğuyor.
languages.name: Excalibur Umbra

languages.description: З тіней довгої ночі виринає новий Екскалібур.
languages.name: Екскалібур Умбра
